verbose_text: The Ser/Thr protein phosphatase PP1 and its non enzymatic co-factor, growth arrest and DNA damage inducible protein 34 (GADD34), can mediate the dephosphorylation of phosphorylated eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2 subunit alpha (p-eIF2alpha), which is a key factor in the regulation of protein synthesis.
evidence: phosphorylated eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2 subunit alpha
